page.title: 06BRAMLEY
page.content: Bramley is on the main A281 road to Cranleigh and Guildford.It has a variety of shops and houses,many of which date back to the 18th century. It can be very noisy on week days,with many lorries passing.In the evenings you can play badminton,tennis or five aside football in the village hall.There is plenty of space for cricket or football on the green but many people just like to walk across it Bramley has many old peoples homes.(eg.) Blunden Court is a block of homes for pensioners.My dad works in the High Street clock shop and is one of the few independent clockmakers left in the area.
